alert.note: Alert for Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 20 at 7:17PM PST until December 21 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog, mainly north and west of Pullman. * WHERE...Oakesdale, Rosalia, Colfax, La Crosse, Tekoa. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas north and west of Pullman will continue to be impacted by dense fog including Highway 195 between Colfax and Rosalia, and Highway 26 between Colfax and Washtucna.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
